items.title: Inception
items.shortDescription: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
items.longDescription: Dom Cobb is a skilled thief, the absolute best in the dangerous art of extraction, stealing valuable secrets from deep within the subconscious during the dream state, when the mind is at its most vulnerable. Cobb's rare ability has made him a coveted player in this treacherous new world of corporate espionage, but it has also made him an international fugitive and cost him everything he has ever loved. Now Cobb is being offered a chance at redemption. One last job could give him his life back but only if he can accomplish the impossibleâ€”inception.

items.title: Breaking Bad
items.shortDescription: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer.
items.longDescription: Breaking Bad follows Walter White, a high school chemistry teacher who turns to manufacturing methamphetamine after being diagnosed with terminal cancer. With his former student, Jesse Pinkman, he navigates the criminal underworld.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.shortDescription: Walter White, a high school chemistry teacher, turns to manufacturing methamphetamine.
episodes.longDescription: Season 1, Episode 1: Walter White, a high school chemistry teacher, receives a terminal cancer diagnosis and teams up with former student Jesse Pinkman to manufacture and sell methamphetamine.

episodes.title: Cat's in the Bag...
episodes.shortDescription: Walter and Jesse face the aftermath of their first cook.
episodes.longDescription: Season 1, Episode 2: Walter and Jesse attempt to dispose of the bodies of two rival dealers, and Walter must deal with his deteriorating health.

episodes.title: Seven Thirty-Seven
episodes.shortDescription: Walter and Jesse face a new adversary in the drug trade.
episodes.longDescription: Season 2, Episode 1: After a drug deal goes awry, Walter and Jesse must deal with the fallout while facing a new and dangerous adversary.

episodes.title: Grilled
episodes.shortDescription: Walter and Jesse are trapped by their adversary.
episodes.longDescription: Season 2, Episode 2: Walter and Jesse are held hostage by their new adversary, Tuco, and must find a way to escape.

items.title: The Shawshank Redemption
items.shortDescription: Two imprisoned men bond over years.
items.longDescription: The Shawshank Redemption is a drama film based on Stephen King's novella. It follows the story of Andy Dufresne, a banker who is sentenced to life in Shawshank State Penitentiary for the murders of his wife and her lover, despite his claims of innocence.

items.title: Stranger Things
items.shortDescription: A group of kids encounter supernatural forces in their town.
items.longDescription: Stranger Things follows a group of kids in the 1980s who uncover a series of supernatural events and secret experiments in their small town, leading to the discovery of a girl with special abilities.

episodes.title: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
episodes.shortDescription: A young boy goes missing, and his friends uncover a series of supernatural mysteries.
episodes.longDescription: Season 1, Episode 1: The disappearance of young Will Byers leads his friends to discover a girl with mysterious powers, unveiling a series of supernatural events.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: The Weirdo on Maple Street
episodes.shortDescription: The boys come across a girl with a shaved head and strange abilities.
episodes.longDescription: Season 1, Episode 2: The boys encounter Eleven, a girl with a shaved head and supernatural abilities, who helps them in their search for Will.

episodes.title: Chapter One: MADMAX
episodes.shortDescription: The town faces new threats while the kids try to return to normal life.
episodes.longDescription: Season 2, Episode 1: As the kids attempt to return to normal life, a new threat emerges in Hawkins, complicating their efforts to move on from past events.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: Trick or Treat, Freak
episodes.shortDescription: The kids face new dangers as they celebrate Halloween.
episodes.longDescription: Season 2, Episode 2: As the kids celebrate Halloween, they encounter new dangers that bring back memories of the previous year's events.

items.title: The Godfather
items.shortDescription: An iconic mafia saga.
items.longDescription: The Godfather is a crime film directed by Francis Ford Coppola, based on the novel by Mario Puzo. It tells the story of the powerful Italian-American crime family of Don Vito Corleone and the transformation of his youngest son, Michael, into a ruthless mafia boss.

items.title: Game of Thrones
items.shortDescription: Noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne.
items.longDescription: Game of Thrones follows the power struggles among noble families as they compete for control of the Iron Throne in the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros, while an ancient enemy awakens.

episodes.title: Winter Is Coming
episodes.shortDescription: Noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne as an ancient enemy awakens.
episodes.longDescription: Season 1, Episode 1: Eddard Stark is torn between his family and an old friend when he is asked to serve at the side of King Robert Baratheon, while a sinister force emerges in the far north.

episodes.title: The Kingsroad
episodes.shortDescription: The Stark family faces new challenges as they travel south.
episodes.longDescription: Season 1, Episode 2: The Stark family heads south to King's Landing, where they encounter danger and intrigue, while Jon Snow heads north to the Wall.

episodes.title: The North Remembers
episodes.shortDescription: The Seven Kingdoms face new threats as winter approaches.
episodes.longDescription: Season 2, Episode 1: With the Stark family scattered and new threats rising, the Seven Kingdoms face an uncertain future as winter approaches.

episodes.title: The Night Lands
episodes.shortDescription: New alliances are formed as old ones are tested.
episodes.longDescription: Season 2, Episode 2: Tyrion arrives in King's Landing to rein in the excesses of Joffrey, while Daenerys and her followers journey through the Red Waste.

items.title: The Dark Knight
items.shortDescription: Batman faces the Joker.
items.longDescription: The Dark Knight, directed by Christopher Nolan, is a superhero film that follows Batman as he forms an alliance with Lieutenant Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent to dismantle organized crime in Gotham City. However, their efforts are disrupted by the rise of a criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

items.title: The Crown
items.shortDescription: The reign of Queen Elizabeth II.
items.longDescription: The Crown traces the reign of Queen Elizabeth II, exploring the political and personal events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

episodes.title: Wolferton Splash
episodes.shortDescription: A young Princess Elizabeth marries Prince Philip.
episodes.longDescription: Season 1, Episode 1: As a young Princess Elizabeth marries Prince Philip, King George VI's health declines, and a new era begins for the British monarchy.

episodes.title: Hyde Park Corner
episodes.shortDescription: Elizabeth faces new challenges as she ascends to the throne.
episodes.longDescription: Season 1, Episode 2: With King George VI's death, Elizabeth becomes Queen and faces the challenges of leading a nation while managing her personal relationships.

episodes.title: Misadventure
episodes.shortDescription: Elizabeth deals with the aftermath of World War II.
episodes.longDescription: Season 2, Episode 1: As Elizabeth deals with the aftermath of World War II, she faces political and personal challenges that test her resolve as a monarch.

episodes.title: A Company of Men
episodes.shortDescription: Philip embarks on a royal tour and faces his own struggles.
episodes.longDescription: Season 2, Episode 2: As Prince Philip embarks on a royal tour, he faces personal struggles that impact his relationship with Elizabeth and his role within the monarchy.

items.title: Pulp Fiction
items.shortDescription: Interwoven stories of crime.
items.longDescription: Pulp Fiction, directed by Quentin Tarantino, is a neo-noir crime film known for its eclectic dialogue, ironic mix of humor and violence, and nonlinear storyline. It intertwines the lives of two hitmen, a boxer, a gangster, and his wife.

items.title: The Departed
items.shortDescription: An undercover cop and a mole hunt each other.
items.longDescription: The Departed, directed by Martin Scorsese, is a crime thriller that follows an undercover cop and a mole in the police force as they try to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

items.title: Forrest Gump
items.shortDescription: Life of an extraordinary man.
items.longDescription: Forrest Gump, directed by Robert Zemeckis, is a drama film that tells the story of a man with low IQ who unwittingly influences several historical events in the 20th century United States, all the while pursuing his own happiness and love.

items.title: The Silence of the Lambs
items.shortDescription: An FBI trainee seeks help from a cannibal.
items.longDescription: The Silence of the Lambs, directed by Jonathan Demme, is a psychological horror-thriller that follows FBI trainee Clarice Starling as she seeks the help of imprisoned cannibalistic serial killer Dr. Hannibal Lecter to catch another serial killer known as 'Buffalo Bill'.

items.title: The Matrix
items.shortDescription: A hacker discovers the truth.
items.longDescription: The Matrix, directed by the Wachowskis, is a science fiction film that follows a hacker named Neo who discovers the reality he lives in is a simulated reality created by sentient machines to subdue the human population, while their bodies' heat and electrical activity are used as an energy source.

items.title: Schindler's List
items.shortDescription: A man saves Jews during the Holocaust.
items.longDescription: Schindler's List, directed by Steven Spielberg, is a historical drama that tells the true story of Oskar Schindler, a German businessman who saved the lives of more than a thousand Polish Jews during the Holocaust by employing them in his factories.

items.title: Gladiator
items.shortDescription: A general becomes a gladiator.
items.longDescription: Gladiator, directed by Ridley Scott, is an epic historical drama film that follows the story of Maximus Decimus Meridius, a Roman general who is betrayed and his family murdered by a corrupt prince. He comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

items.title: The Shawshank Redemption
items.shortDescription: Two imprisoned men bond over years.
items.longDescription: The Shawshank Redemption, directed by Frank Darabont, is a drama film based on Stephen King's novella. It follows the story of Andy Dufresne, a banker who is sentenced to life in Shawshank State Penitentiary for the murders of his wife and her lover, despite his claims of innocence. Over the following two decades, he forms a friendship with fellow prisoner Ellis 'Red' Redding and becomes instrumental in a money-laundering operation led by the prison warden.

items.title: Jurassic Park
items.shortDescription: Dinosaurs run amok in a park.
items.longDescription: Jurassic Park, directed by Steven Spielberg, is a science fiction adventure film that follows the story of a disastrous attempt to create a theme park of cloned dinosaurs. Chaos ensues when a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run amok.

items.title: Goodfellas
items.shortDescription: The rise and fall of a gangster.
items.longDescription: Goodfellas, directed by Martin Scorsese, is a crime film that follows the rise and fall of mob associate Henry Hill and his friends over a period from 1955 to 1980. The film portrays the highs and lows of life in the Mafia and is based on the non-fiction book 'Wiseguy' by Nicholas Pileggi.

items.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
items.shortDescription: A hobbit begins an epic quest.
items.longDescription: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, directed by Peter Jackson, is a fantasy adventure film based on the novel by J.R.R. Tolkien. It follows Frodo Baggins as he embarks on a quest to destroy the One Ring and prevent the Dark Lord Sauron from conquering Middle-earth.

items.title: Braveheart
items.shortDescription: A Scottish warrior leads a revolt.
items.longDescription: Braveheart, directed by Mel Gibson, is a historical drama that tells the story of William Wallace, a 13th-century Scottish warrior who led the Scots in the First War of Scottish Independence against King Edward I of England.

items.title: The Avengers
items.shortDescription: Superheroes unite to save Earth.
items.longDescription: The Avengers, directed by Joss Whedon, is a superhero film that brings together Marvel's mightiest heroes to form a team to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

items.title: Dune
items.shortDescription: A hero's journey on a desert planet.
items.longDescription: Dune, directed by Denis Villeneuve, is a science fiction epic based on Frank Herbert's novel. It follows Paul Atreides, a young noble, as he navigates political intrigue, betrayal, and his destiny on the desert planet Arrakis.

items.title: Titanic
items.shortDescription: A love story aboard the doomed ship.
items.longDescription: Titanic, directed by James Cameron, is a romantic drama film that tells the story of Jack and Rose, two young lovers who meet on the ill-fated RMS Titanic. As the ship sinks, their love and survival are put to the ultimate test.

items.title: No Time to Die
items.shortDescription: James Bond returns for a final mission.
items.longDescription: No Time to Die, directed by Cary Joji Fukunaga, is an action-packed spy thriller. James Bond has left active service, but his peace is short-lived as an old friend from the CIA turns up asking for help, leading Bond onto the trail of a mysterious villain armed with dangerous new technology.

items.title: Interstellar
items.shortDescription: A journey to save humanity.
items.longDescription: Interstellar, directed by Christopher Nolan, is a science fiction film that follows a group of astronauts who travel through a wormhole near Saturn in search of a new home for humanity as Earth faces a global famine.

items.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
items.shortDescription: Spider-Man faces new multiverse challenges.
items.longDescription: Spider-Man: No Way Home, directed by Jon Watts, follows Peter Parker as he seeks the help of Doctor Strange to make the world forget his identity. The spell goes wrong, opening the multiverse and bringing villains from other dimensions, forcing Peter to face his greatest challenge yet.

items.title: The Lion King
items.shortDescription: A lion cub's journey to adulthood.
items.longDescription: The Lion King, directed by Roger Allers and Rob Minkoff, is an animated musical drama film that tells the story of Simba, a young lion prince who flees his kingdom after the murder of his father, Mufasa, by his uncle Scar. With the help of his friends, Simba must return to reclaim his rightful throne.

items.title: The Suicide Squad
items.shortDescription: A team of supervillains on a deadly mission.
items.longDescription: The Suicide Squad, directed by James Gunn, is an action-packed superhero film that follows a group of supervillains from Belle Reve prison who are recruited by the government for a black ops mission. They must destroy a Nazi-era laboratory and face numerous deadly obstacles along the way.

items.title: Fight Club
items.shortDescription: An insomniac forms an underground club.
items.longDescription: Fight Club, directed by David Fincher, is a drama film that follows an insomniac office worker who forms an underground fight club with a soap salesman. The club evolves into something much more, challenging societal norms and personal identities.

items.title: Black Widow
items.shortDescription: Natasha Romanoff confronts her past.
items.longDescription: Black Widow, directed by Cate Shortland, is a superhero film that follows Natasha Romanoff as she confronts the darker parts of her ledger when a dangerous conspiracy with ties to her past arises. Pursued by a force that will stop at nothing to bring her down, Natasha must deal with her history as a spy and the broken relationships left in her wake long before she became an Avenger.

items.title: Inglourious Basterds
items.shortDescription: A group of soldiers plot to kill Nazis.
items.longDescription: Inglourious Basterds, directed by Quentin Tarantino, is a war film that tells the story of a group of Jewish-American soldiers known as 'The Basterds' who plan to assassinate Nazi leaders in occupied France during World War II. Their mission coincides with a theater owner's vengeful plans.

items.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
items.shortDescription: A martial artist confronts his past.
items.longDescription: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings, directed by Destin Daniel Cretton, follows Shang-Chi, a skilled martial artist who must confront the past he thought he left behind when he is drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.
